internships.description: Built a full-stack blogging platform using the MERN stack with JWT and Google OAuth authentication, bcrypt hashing, and role-based access. Developed 15+ RESTful APIs with Express.js and middleware for features like blog CRUD, comments, readlists, search, and SEO-friendly slugs.

projects.title: Dashboard Redesign
projects.description: Led the redesign of the analytics dashboard for better usability and performance.
